title: Marco Polo's travels
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Hal Kopel
brief_description: Marco Polo wrote a book of his travels in 1298, when he was a POW. He was 17 when he left Venice on his journey. This film tells the story of Marco Polo’s travels to China and back to Europe. An animated map traces his historic journey.
